title: Kurokami The Animation
synopsis: High school student Ibuki Keita has been haunted by misfortune for as long as he can remember. For no apparent reason, everyone around him dies tragically. Ultimately, he refuses to become too close to anyone, even his childhood friend Akane. This leaves Keita alone in a life full of misery and disgrace.
voices: ['Shitaya, Noriko', 'Namikawa, Daisuke', 'Ohara, Sayaka', 'Nakata, Jouji', 'Konishi, Katsuyuki', 'Tamura, Yukari', 'Nojima, Hirofumi', 'Sasaki, Nozomi', 'Touma, Yumi', 'Kitamura, Eri']
staff: [['Satou, Hiroyuki', ['Producer']], ['Kobayashi, Tsuneo', ['Director']], ['Kikuta, Hiromi', ['Sound Director']], ['Yonetani, Yoshitomo', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']]]
